<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal">  MemoryUseOrDef &#42;MA = MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(M);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;GV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GV-&gt;isConstant() &amp;&amp; GV-&gt;hasDefinitiveInitializer())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa241826e10b4a9bf77c3115e7160d3c7">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(M);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">  BatchAAResults BAA(&#42;AA, EEA);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><Highlight kind="normal">  MemoryAccess &#42;AnyClobber = MA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuseordef/#a20455da69cab73871b8c0111f0afe712">getDefiningAccess</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to turn a partially redundant memset + memcpy into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// smaller memset + memcpy.  We don&#39;t need the memcpy size for this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The memcpy must post-dom the memset, so limit this to the same basic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block. A non-local generalization is likely not worthwhile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;MD = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;MemoryDef&gt;</a>(DestClobber))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;MDep = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;MemSetInst&gt;</a>(MD-&gt;getMemoryInst()))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (processMemSetMemCpyDependence(M, MDep, BAA))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><Highlight kind="normal">  MemoryAccess &#42;SrcClobber = MSSA-&gt;getWalker()-&gt;getClobberingMemoryAccess(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><Highlight kind="normal">      AnyClobber, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a207e239d68b66b0d5ccad5997a5ef027">MemoryLocation::getForSource</a>(M), BAA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There are five possible optimizations we can do for memcpy:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   a) memcpy-memcpy xform which exposes redundance for DSE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   b) call-memcpy xform for return slot optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   c) memcpy from freshly alloca&#39;d space or space that has just started</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      its lifetime copies undefined data, and we can therefore eliminate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      the memcpy in favor of the data that was already at the destination.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   d) memcpy from a just-memset&#39;d source can be turned into memset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify that the copied-from memory doesn&#39;t change in between the memcpy and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the byval call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    memcpy(a &lt;- b)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    &#42;b = 42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is called on memcpy dest pointer arguments attributed as immutable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><Highlight kind="comment">/// during call. Try to use memcpy source directly if all of the following</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><Highlight kind="comment">/// conditions are satisfied.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 The memcpy dst is neither modified during the call nor captured by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><Highlight kind="comment">/// call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 The memcpy dst is an alloca with known alignment &amp; size.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><Highlight kind="comment">///     2-1. The memcpy length == the alloca size which ensures that the new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><Highlight kind="comment">///     pointer is dereferenceable for the required range</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><Highlight kind="comment">///     2-2. The src pointer has alignment &gt;= the alloca alignment or can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><Highlight kind="comment">///     enforced so.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 The memcpy dst and src is not modified between the memcpy and the call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (if MSSA clobber check is safe.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 4 The memcpy src is not modified during the call. (ModRef check shows no</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Mod.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemCpyOptPass::processImmutArgument(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgNo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Executes one iteration of MemCpyOptPass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemCpyOptPass::iterateOnFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MadeChange = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk all instruction in the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BasicBlock &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip unreachable blocks. For example processStore assumes that an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction in a BB can&#39;t be dominated by a later instruction in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same BB (which is a scenario that can happen for an unreachable BB that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has itself as a predecessor).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT-&gt;isReachableFromEntry(&amp;BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> BI = BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>(), BE = BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0b4e7bee9b8575cc7db73329f1a561bd">end</a>(); BI != BE;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Avoid invalidating the iterator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = &amp;&#42;BI++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RepeatInstruction = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><Highlight kind="normal">        MadeChange |= processStore(SI, BI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;M = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;MemSetInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
